PointSubSet class¶

class PointSubSet.PointSubSet(points, indices)[source]¶

Holds a subset of a PointSet

Provides the same interface as PointSet

Attributes

FieldsDimension Return number of columns (channels)
GetIndices Return points’ indices
Intensity Return nX1 ndarray of intensity values
Size
return: number of points
X
return: X coordinates
Y
return: Y coordinates
Z
return: Z coordinates
data The data as stored in self.__data
path Path to datafile, if exists

Methods

AddData2Fields(data[, field]) Add data to a field
GetPoint(index) Retrieve specific point(s) by index (when the index is according to the subset and not to the original set)
ToGeoPandas([crs])
param crs: coordinate spatial reference, if exists
ToNumpy() Return the points as numpy nX3 ndarray
ToPolyData()
return: tvtk.PolyData of the current PointSet
ToRDD() Convert PointSet into pySpark Resilient Destributed Dataset (RDD)
UpdateFields(**kwargs) Update a field within the PointSet
save(path_or_buf, **kwargs) Save the PointSet in either json or hdf5.
setPath(path) Sets path to dataset
setValues(**kwargs)
GetIndices¶

Return points’ indices

GetPoint(index)[source]¶

Retrieve specific point(s) by index (when the index is according to the subset and not to the original set)

Parameters: index – the index of the point to return
Returns: specific point/s as numpy nX3 ndarray
Intensity¶

Return nX1 ndarray of intensity values

Size¶
Returns: number of points
ToNumpy()[source]¶

Return the points as numpy nX3 ndarray

ToPolyData()[source]¶
Returns: tvtk.PolyData of the current PointSet
